paramInformation.label: Buzzer Beep Times
paramInformation.description: 0 : disable  1~100: sound 1~100 beeps (0.5s on, 0.5s off) 127: continue beep till cancel trigger

metadata.inclusion: Press the button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The LED will blink red 3 times when successful.
metadata.exclusion: Press the button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The LED will blink red 3 times when successful, then blink red for 30 seconds at one blink per two seconds.
metadata.reset: Press the button 3 times within 1.5 seconds and hold the third press for 10 seconds until the LED blinks red.
